name: Willie McCoy
description: McCoy is a fixer living somewhere in the northern reaches of South California. Being innomadterritory, McCoy gets most of his pay from the clients that hire nomads. At some point, Willie was contacted byJackie Welles, who needed a nomad to help him smuggle a crate across theBorder CrossingintoNight City. The fixer hiredVto do the job; both of whom already knew each other as they had worked together in the past. The problem was that V had left theBakkersprior to their conversation, but V persuaded him to help them one last time. Eventually, when V was reaching the meeting point, theircarbroke...
